column2: "Due
column3: Ariel
column4: kurow a David kyeer mu nsera no! Hom mfa afe nka afe ho; hom mma afahyɛ mbɔ aprɔw mbra
column5: , #29.1 ARIEL: Asekyerɛ nye dɛ: Nyankopɔn mbukyia."

column2: "nna mebɛma Ariel ho akyer no
column3: na nkɔmbɔdzi ɔnye sukwadwom aba hɔ: na ɔayɛ dɛ Ariel ama me."

column2: "Na mebɛkyer nsera etwa wo ho kɔntɔnkrɔn
column3: na medze aban abɔ wo ho dantaban
column4: na mahohɔr pempe esiw wo kwan."

column2: "Na ibefi famu tɔnn akasa
column3: na wo kasaa efi huntuma mu ayɛ huhuhuhu; na wo ndze befi famu aba na ayɛ dɛ ɔsaman ne ndze
column4: na wo kasaa efi huntuma mu awasa."

column2: "Na w'atamfo dodow bɛyɛ dɛ huntuma wekoweko
column3: na etsiɔdzenfo dodow no bɛyɛ dɛ ntsɛw a ɔresen kɔ: ɛhɛɛ
column4: ɔbɛba dɛm amonmu ara wɔ awerɛfir mu."

column2: "Dɔm EWURADZE dze ɔsenaman
column3: nye asaasewosow
column7: nye ogya a ɔmemen ne gyaframee bɛba abɛsera no."

column2: "Na amanaman nyina mu dɔm a wɔnye Ariel dzii ako
column3: hɔn a wɔnye ɔno na n'akoban ko
column4: na wɔma no ho kyer no nyina

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ mbrɛ nyia ɔkɔm dze no so daa
column3: dɛ oridzidzi; na onyan
column4: na no kɔm no da ho ara wɔ hɔ no: anaadɛ mbrɛ nyia nsukɔm dze no so daa
column7: na no nsukɔm da ho ara wɔ hɔ no: dɛmara so na amanaman nyinara a wɔnye bepɔw Zion dzi ako no

column2: "Hom ho mbow hom kɛse
column3: na ɔnyɛ hom nwanwa; hom mfura hom enyi na hom nyɛ enyifurafo! Hom mbow
column4: naaso nnyɛ nsa ntsi a; hom nto ntentan

column2: "Na EWURADZE ehuei egu hom do
column3: nda heii sunsum a
column5: mekyerɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no; na hom etsir

column2: "Na enyido adzehu nyina ayɛ hom dɛ nwoma a wɔasɔw ano mu nkyerɛwee a adasa dze ma nyia onyim nwoma dɛ
column3: Meserɛ wo

column2: "na wɔdze nwoma no ma nyia onnyim nwoma dɛ
column3: Meserɛ wo

column2: "Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column3: Susuampa dɛ ɔman yi twe bɛn me
column4: na wɔdze hɔn ano nye hɔn anofamfa dzi me nyi
column5: na hɔn akoma dze woeyi efi me nkyɛn kɔ ekyirekyir
column6: na hɔn suro a wosuro me yɛ nyimpa ahyɛdze a wɔdze akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn no ntsi:"

column2: "hwɛ
column3: mobɔkɔ do ara mayɛ ahobowdze wɔ ɔman yi mu
column4: ahobowdze nye anwanwadze bi a: na hɔn enyansafo nyansaa no ahera
column5: na hɔn abadwembafo ntseasee ehuntsa hɔn."

column2: "Wondue
column3: hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔn apam huntsa EWURADZE fee
column4: na hɔn ndzeyɛɛ wɔ sum mu na wɔka dɛ
column5: Woana na ohu hɛn? Woana na onyim hɛn?"

column2: "Hom si ndzɛmba tsir adze! Aso wobobu ɔwemfo dɛ awendɛtse; anaa adze a wɔyɛe no bɛse nyia ɔyɛɛ no no dɛ
column3: Nnyɛ ɔno yɛɛ me; anaa dza wɔahyehyɛ bɛse nyia ɔhyehyɛɛ dɛ

column2: "Ana ɔnnkaa kakraabi ma Lebanon adan mfuwa prɔmprɔm
column3: na mfuwa prɔmprɔm no woebu no dɛ kwaa?"

column2: "Na da no mu na etsitsifo bɛtse nwoma mu asɛm no
column3: na efurafo enyi efi kusukusuyɛ na sum no mu ehu adze."

column2: "Abrɛfo so bɛma hɔn enyigye adɔɔ so wɔ EWURADZE mu
column3: na adasa mu ehiafo asɛpɛw hɔnho wɔ Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no mu."

column2: "Na otsiɔdzennyi no ayɛ kwa
column3: na ɔtwetwesifo egyaa
column4: na hɔn a wɔtsɛw emumuyɛ nyina woetwa hɔn akyen:"

column2: "hɔn asɛndzii mu wɔma nyimpa yɛ mbratonyi
column3: na wosua nyia ɔka enyim wɔ kuropon ano efir
column4: na wɔdze nsɛnhuhuw dan ɔtseneneenyi fa nkyɛn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE a ɔpoon Abraham no ka wɔ Jakob fifo ho nye yi: Afei Jakob enyi ronnto
column3: eso n'enyim ronntow fitaa bio."

column2: "Na sɛ ohu ne mba a wɔyɛ me nsaano edwuma no wɔ ne ntamu a
column3: wɔbɛtsew me dzin ho; nyew
column5: na wɔabɔ hu wɔ Israel Nyankopɔn ho."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔfomfom wɔ sunsum mu so benya ntseasee
column3: na hɔn a wohwinhwin bosua nkyerɛkyerɛ."
